idle_state.h
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #include "unicorn/state.h"
2 /* State description:
3  The idle state is instansiated as the first state on boot-up, or if the current state has been aborted.
4  1. Print the user interface to console
5  2. Await new command on ROS Topic Web_unicorn_cmd
6  2 alt. if a key has been sent in the console take it as command
7  3. Exit with next state set to what's specified in new command
8 */
9 class IDLEState : public State
10 {
11 public:
15  IDLEState();
19  ~IDLEState();
23  Command run();
29  Command setNewCmd(Command new_cmd);
30 protected:
31 private:
32 };
